author: iwarnes3
title: Footie aces Frank Lampard and John Terry confess to shaving their ‘back, sack and cracks’ on new ITV panel show
text:
TV Magazine fifty shaves of frank shocker Footie aces Frank Lampard and John Terry confess to shaving their ‘back, sack and cracks’ on new ITV panel show 
Holly Willoughby couldn't contain her laughter as the two opened up about their beauty regimes on new sports comedy show Play to the Whistle FROM DAN WOOTTON'S BIZARRE COLUMN 20th February 2017, 9:57 pm
